page.title: 17BYFIELD PLAYING FIELD
page.content: IT IS PROPOSED TO ADD TO THE PLAYING FIELD BY LEVELLING MORE GROUND AND BY MAKING FOOTBALL AND CRICKET PITCHES, AND EXTRA TENNIS COURT AND AN ADVENTURE PLAYGROUND.IT WOULD COST 30 000 POUNDS. WE FOUND OUT A FEW PEOPLE DID NOT WANT THE PLAYING FIELD TO BE CHANGED BECAUSE OF NATURE REASONS.ONE PERSON SAID THAT 30 000 POUNDS WAS TOO MUCH.MANY THOUGHT THAT THE MONEY COULD GO TO A BETTER CAUSE.A LOT OF PEOPLE WANTED THE PLAYING FIELD CHANGED BECAUSE OF THE FACILTIES THAT WOULD BE MADE.MOST PEOPLE USED THE PLAYING FIELD AS IT HAS A NICE VIEW TO LOOK AT.OTHERS ENJOYED IT FOR WALKING AND OTHERS FOR PLAYING GAMES, ALTHOUGH ONLY A FEW PEOPLE WERE IN THAT CATEGORY.IF IT WAS CHANGED ONLY A FEW PEOPLE WOULD USE IT MORE AND A FEW WOULD USE IT LESS.
